text:
Hotel The 101 Jakarta Airport merupakan salah satu pilihan hotel yang tepat untuk mengadakan agenda bisnis/group meeting kami dan letaknya cukup strategis dari Bandara ketika ada mobilisasi mendesak.

Area lobby minimalis disupport interior yang cukup eye catchy dan elegant, kamar tidur terasa bersih dan nyaman untuk ditempati, buffet di resto cukup tasty, meeting room spacious minusnya mungkin karena ada pilar yg membatasi jarak pandang ke screen projector, varian coffeebreaknya cukup menarik meski ada complain karena dikasih varian yg sama seperti di hari sebelumnya namun langsung direspon dan disiapkan item tambahan oleh Chef Zaid didukung kerjasama yang baik dan kooperatif dari tim Banquet oleh Satya dan Lucky.

Sambutan yang bersahabat dan asistensi yang ramah dan hangat saat group check in dari tim Front Desk yang kami temui dengan Mba Dessy, Mba Patricia dan Mas Fariz.

Satu lagi kami juga berterima kasih kepada Mba Winda dari tim sales dan marketing yang sudah membantu mengakomodir dan memfasilitasi setiap kebutuhan kami baik di hotel dan ruang meeting, keep up the good work.
title: Good Experience

text: Pelayanannya bagus semuanya , makanannya enak bervariatif belum sempat ikut shuttle bus nya untuk kebersihan kamar bagus bersih nyaman, reception nya ramah dengan mbak Desy , security dengan pak Aditya sangat help full makasih

text:
Got stuck in Jakarta unexpectedly for 2 nights due to airline bad mistakes, but luckily this hotel ‘saved’ me and another two fellow passengers. Without any prior booking, they sent a free shuttle van to pick us up from the airport nearly midnight and put us in the nice guest rooms. 

Hotel staff at the reception such as Shelvi ,Mahesa, Arif , Hendry are super friendly to offer all kinds of help (e.g., helping me search a nearby PCR test center  to meet urgent travel requirements, referring us a very nice shopping center with a bit amid Chinese new year festive flavor which helped us explore part of the Jakarta city within the limited hours we had, etc). The driver team is just as amazing as they are who sent us to the airport and picked us up several times during the 2 nights we stayed with them. 

Overall clean, new and modern guest rooms. Strong Wi-Fi network is always very helpful for travelers. Very close to the airport so perfect if people need a few nights for transit. Nice breakfast with fresh and sufficient food and beverage as well as some local Indonesian cuisines. The rooftop bar and restaurant on 11/F is very good place to go if you don’t want to be bothered by the crazy traffic outside but still get to enjoy a bit of the night views of the Jakarta city. They’ve got a band there for hours too. 

Thank you so much again for taking care of us! Definitely a lovely memory in Jakarta!
title: Lovely memory of Jakarta!

text:
I stayed for 1 night at the hotel. Booked from one of the OTA for Deluxe City View but they gave me room with Terrace which is great! 

The hotel have free airport shuttle and you can reach the hotel before arrival for pick up. Also tell the receptionist if you need a shuttle to airport as well, they will arrange it.

The hotel is brand new built, the driver, Arief, he told me it’s just open last December 2021. It’s located in Cengkareng Business Centre, not much for the view. There are 2 different convenient stores near the hotel. I love the smell of the lobby, smells really good. The receptionist, Asiel, were friendly, nice and welcome. Check-in process was fast and smooth. All staffs I met along the way to the lift were smiling and friendly.

Room is spacious, clean, love the terrace. It has zen vibe with benches from wood and it has a huge plant pot in the middle. Unfortunately the plants were not watered enough. It was dry. 

I booked the room with breakfast. The restaurant opened from 6 - 10 am. It’s located right behind the receptionist and in front of the swimming pool. I didn’t really enjoy the food. The porridge was too salty. The sausage and beef bacon were cold. Spaghetti aglio olio just okay. Papaya too ripe. I took something written “Pudding” from the fridge, but when I tried it was oatmeal in chocolate milk with chia seed. i guess. I hope they can improve the breakfast quality.

Overall I love staying at this hotel. It was comfortable, staffs very nice & friendly. Thumbs up for Arief, the driver for being super friendly! He helped me to bring my luggage to the room and take me to the airport the next day.
title: New Hotel with great service!

text:
Stayed for one night in this brand new hotel. 
I choose this hotel as i had early morning flight, and as it has hourly shuttle and located very near to departure terminal. 
I arrived at evening, the check in process was fast and efficient.
I stayed at 11th floor  if im not mistaken. Eveything is brand new and clean. Room is quite spacious compared to other 101 i stayed in other city.
Its clean, tidy, good sound proofness, addequate amenities in bathroom, good water pressure.
Surrounded by commercial area, as its newly build so most of stall are empty. But there are 2 supermarkets in walking distance. 
Infortunately they dont have basement, it makes difficult to park during rainy season. 

U havent tried their bfast as i have to leave early in the morning. Shuttle is available every hour, distance to airport is less than 10 minutes away. 
There are small pool in ground floor and will be jogging track (project is on going during my stay). 
I am happy with my stay.
title: Nice brand new airport hotel
